name: KaziePop
description:
kaziepop is a stupid fucking game where you answer like 5 questions and listen to daft punk. why? i have no fucking clue

what if you made a joke tweet about a kazuhira miller dating sim? and a twitter parody account made it? this is how KaziePop was made, created by some scumfuck who copy pasted the same c# code and compiled it and posted it on here.  made in less than a day one of it's most important influencers had called it a "national treasure".
